ema wishwawidyalaye 23 wani upadhi pradanothsawaya meya wana athara ehidi samanya upadhiya saha pashchath upadhiya hadaru 182 denaku upadhi labagathha.mehidi wadiduratath adahas palakala janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha, 1970 dashakaye bedumwadayata aa wadu demala nayakayanta pasu kaleka sidu wu de mathakaye pawathina bawa sihipath kala mahinda rajapaksha mahatha wadukkodeyihidi eda eelam yojanawa gena aa amirthalingamge sita demala nayakayin awasanaye bedumwadaye godurak wi ghathanaya wu bawada sinhala, demala, muslim, siyalu jathin me athithayen padam igena gathayuthu bawada prakasha kaleya.wellamulliwayikkal samarum madhyasthanayak bawata path karagannata athamun kihipawathawakma uthsahagatha bawa pawasu ee mahatha samaya agaya karana apa ka thulath me sambandhayen aththe balawath kanagatuwak bawada ema pradeshaya wiwidha thrastha kriyakarakamwalata sambandha wu thrasthawadiya awasan gamana giya sthanaya bawada awadharanaya kaleya.eda muhamale sita palanaya wune el.ti.ti.eeyen bawa penwadun mahinda rajapaksha mahatha ee wagema nangenahira palathe thunen dekaka balaya thibune owunata bawada me pradeshawalata yanna me rate janathawata thahanam wu bawada sihipath kaleya.
